name: Cats! Emergency!
description:
You're here! Purr-fect!

You're a new emergency response employee in training, excited and ready to take on whatever the job throws at you! You sit down in front of the computer for your first day and it's ... cats?

Answer calls on time, try to descipher their meows and send out patrol cars to different locations in the city to avoid cat on cat violence!

The game is played entirely with mouse. Click on your cars and where you want them to go. The cars will return automatically when they're done.

Good luck, and remember, meow, meow meow!

----------

art & design: Matilda Häggström
programming & design: Alexander Volkers

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
